author: jonathan
msg: Now using a Makefile, rather than ant.

author: antelder
msg: Start of a binding that uses Hazelcast. The idea is that it would be used for the sca binding and use the Hazelcast based endpoint registry with Hazelcast handling all the remote communications. This avoids all the issues other bindings have with working out what the remote endpoint address is.

author: kwright
msg: Address CONNECTORS-16.  Move fingerprinting functionality under the output connector umbrella, which then permits the Solr connector to behave differently from the GTS connector.

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-2213 do not try to call any optional modify() method if the component has not yet been instantiated

author: antelder
msg: Update matching code to work with service URIs starting with a slash character
